top_reviews.title: Comfortable and great to enhance a look
top_reviews.body: I got these for my husband for a Xmas gift. So far he thinks theyre very comfortable and easy to put on. He doesnt have a great sense of style so I love to see him dress nice with these casual shoes.Read more

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States  on May 12, 2023

top_reviews.title: Looks Great But Lacks Support and Cushion
top_reviews.body: UPDATE: added a star for amazing customer service who reached out and worked with me on the product to find something better.  Shoe looks great and is a great middle ground between sneaker and dress shoe I've been wanting for work (in an office). After a few days of wearing them, my main issue is that the "cushion" for your feet is more like a hard rubber and just walking a few blocks around the city find my feet are sore. The arch support is also minimal. I would recommend these shoes but would say an insert is almost a requirement for them.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
UPDATE: added a star for amazing customer service who reached out and worked with me on the product to find something better.

Shoe looks great and is a great middle ground between sneaker and dress shoe I've been wanting for work (in an office). After a few days of wearing them, my main issue is that the "cushion" for your feet is more like a hard rubber and just walking a few blocks around the city find my feet are sore. The arch support is also minimal. I would recommend these shoes but would say an insert is almost a requirement for them.

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States  on March 20, 2023

top_reviews.title: They're pretty cheap shoes for a pretty cheap price
top_reviews.body: What is there to say? They're fine if you're looking for a cheap pair of relatively stylish shoes. But they aren't super comfortable. And the deal-breaker for me was they're quite narrow towards the toes. I don't have wide feet by any means, and they were narrow enough to be mildly uncomfortable. Aside from how narrow they get, they fit as expected.  Again, for 1 off events where you don't want to spend a ton, and don't mind being slightly uncomfortable, they're great! Otherwise, I probably wouldn't choose these ones in specific.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
What is there to say? They're fine if you're looking for a cheap pair of relatively stylish shoes. But they aren't super comfortable. date.raw: Reviewed in the United Kingdom  on July 3, 2021

top_reviews.title: Elegant and comfortable
top_reviews.body: Original review May 2021: 4.5+ stars. Exactly what I was looking for to replace my worn out sneakers, and these are quite a bit more elegant than my previous no-name brand of similar style. Based on the reviews, I was worried these would pinch my wide feet but selecting my normal size fits just fine. I have walked around the neighbourhood in them for a few km. One issue that has developed is a small blister on the balls of my feet (near the big toes). It could be partly blamed on my old socks, but also I need to work in the innersoles to better mould to my feet shape. I think this is to be expected with any new pair of shoes. Love the look! Would buy again, and would recommend.  Update Aug 2022: 3.5 stars. They lasted just over a year of daily use, four out of the five seasons. I enjoyed using them overall and received several complements about them. The tops have since faded to a dark grey, and the heel on one shoe has detached from the bottom so it fills with tiny pebbles. I'm in the market for new shoes today and tbh I'm hesitating to buy these again because I don't want to buy new shoes every year, it seems wasteful. Really liked the style of these though.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Original review May 2021: 4.5+ stars. Exactly what I was looking for to replace my worn out sneakers, and these are quite a bit more elegant than my previous no-name brand of similar style. Based on the reviews, I was worried these would pinch my wide feet but selecting my normal size fits just fine. I have walked around the neighbourhood in them for a few km. One issue that has developed is a small blister on the balls of my feet (near the big toes). It could be partly blamed on my old socks, but also I need to work in the innersoles to better mould to my feet shape. I think this is to be expected with any new pair of shoes. Love the look! Would buy again, and would recommend.

Update Aug 2022: 3.5 stars. They lasted just over a year of daily use, four out of the five seasons. I enjoyed using them overall and received several complements about them. The tops have since faded to a dark grey, and the heel on one shoe has detached from the bottom so it fills with tiny pebbles. I'm in the market for new shoes today and tbh I'm hesitating to buy these again because I don't want to buy new shoes every year, it seems wasteful. Really liked the style of these though.
Read more
